title: kETkum varam
sahitya:
kETkum varam tannai koDuttennai nI AtkoLLa vENumE ArumukhanE nAn


anupallavi

  kOTTai kaTTi manadil cESTai sheyyum pulan vETTaiyADum kETTai viraTTi OTTa nAn


caraNam   bandha vinaigaLin pAshap-piDippellAm indak-kaNamuDanE vendu vilaghiDavum
enda vidamAghavum endan idayam ini nondu naliyAda nilai peravum nAn
